name: Snow Day (hollie)
description:
Snow Day is a 2D Platformer 

Help Mr. Snowman find his way back to the igloo. Avoid cacti and lava patches. 

Controls:

  • A, D and Left, Right to move Mr. Snowman across the screen 
  • Space to jump 

Snow Day  is an entry for Chill Jam 2023 

Credits: 

Programming: Hollie Leggett 

Art & Animation: Sky O'Connell 

✨Our first time making a game✨
